casebody.data:
Ray Richard PERRY
v.
STATE of North Carolina. No. 643P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Ray Richard Perry, Pro Se. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 28th day of December 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
